item.description: This is a networking mixer for Business Professionals and Entrepreneurs who want to gain exposure and meet other like minded individuals with whom they can build relationships and work with in the future. This event mixer will include various fun activities to help individuals network and mingle. As well as great music,delicous finger foods,desserts, and beverages along with amazing giveaways and door prizes. So Please Come Meet Us!
item.name: The Local Business and Entrepenuers Networking Mixer!!
